briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the background color of the stroke.
Defines the color of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value for a Shape is Black.

briefdescription.para: Defines a second color for a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value for a Shape is White.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the dot and dash pattern for a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Solid.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead length for the end of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Medium.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead for the end of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead width for the end of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Medium.

briefdescription.para: Defines the cap style for the end of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Flat.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the foreground color of the stroke.
Defines the image for a stroke image or pattern fill.
Defines the join style of a polyline.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Round.

briefdescription.para: Defines the line style of the stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Single.

briefdescription.para: Defines whether the path will be stroked.

detaileddescription.para: The default value for a Shape is true.

briefdescription.para: Defines the amount of transparency of a stroke. Valid range is from 0 to 1.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead length for the start of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Medium.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead for the start of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is None.

briefdescription.para: Defines the arrowhead width for the start of a stroke.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Medium.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value between 0.0 (opaque) and 1.0 (clear) representing the degree of transparency of the stroke.
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the stroke is visible.
Defines the brush thickness that strokes the path of a shape in points.

detaileddescription.para: The default value for a Shape is 0.75.

briefdescription.para: Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_BackColor.

Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_ForeColor.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_JoinStyle.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_LineStyle.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_On.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_Opacity.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_StartArrowLength.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_StartArrowType.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_StartArrowWidth.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_Transparency.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_Visible.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Drawing::Stroke::get_Weight.
Defines a stroke for a shape.

detaileddescription.para: Use the Stroke property to access stroke properties of a shape. You do not create instances of the Stroke class directly.
